internationalizations.description:
MERCS Technologies consists of a set of bright like-minded individuals who are passionate about technology and innovation. At MERCS strive to create a free and open culture where individuals are encouraged to express themselves and try out new things. MERCS provides IT solutions specializing in regulated and non-regulated iGaming markets. MERCS has provided service to a number of companies based in the Channel Islands, UK, India, Canada, and Sri Lanka.

When I was there I have done so many backend and frontend implementations. I have developed the front-end and backend aspects of the implementation of a real-time trivia gaming system. I have hands-on experience with development testing, bug fixing new feature implementation, and Performance Enhancing development. Also, I have done some implementations using HTML and CSS included with mobile responsiveness.

Institute of Software Engineering The International Journal of Software Engineering (IJSE) provides a forum for archiving and disseminating state-of-the-art and state-of-the-practice in all areas of software engineering. IJSE is a biannual refereed journal published by the Software Engineering Competence Center (SECC) of the Information Technology Industry Development Agency (ITIDA).

As a Software Engineer Trainee in IJSE, I have done so many projects that contain industry-level development process. I have hands-on experience in desktop application development, Complex RESTful backend development, Web Development, Mobile Development.
